Name: [Revelation] Shaft Break VI
Desc:
[Revelation Skill]
Arrows explode and Malice remains as a tornado tormenting enemies. Only in the explosion, Death Blessing grants the Blessing of Death, and the explosion and tornado do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Required Skill: Shaft Break Lv. 20 or higher

HFields.h1:
MP Cost: 77. Penetrates up to 3 enemies at 782% Damage 3 times.
Pulls up to 7 enemies when destroyed and explodes, and the explosion attacks up to 10 enemies at 870% Damage 10 times.
The tornado attacks up to 10 enemies at 151% Damage 3 times in a row.
Cooldown: 11 sec.
